allow: Bash(git commit -m "Initial commit: MVP ready for production deployment")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix: Configure FastAPI app for Vercel deployment

- Add api/index.py as Vercel entry point
- Update main.py to serve static files (images, css, js)
- Configure vercel.json for Next.js + FastAPI hybrid deployment
- Add routes for serving Next.js frontend and FastAPI backend
- Mount img_original and img_procesada for gallery
- Update CORS to include vercel.app domains
- Add requirements.txt in project root for Vercel
- Add .vercelignore file
- Add health check endpoint at /api/health")
